Hi, I am an MBA student at the University of Liverpool and am
conducting a =
study into the benefits that software organizations gain
by actively practi=
cing unit testing.

What I found in the past years is that so many people d=
o claim a lot
of benefits around unit testing, but as soon as you ask for "=
hard
facts" they have no answer. 

My study wants to bring more light into =
this area and therefore I need
feedback and data to get to a descriptive ov=
erview on how the benefits
are perceived in the "real world" and not only i=
n books and articles.

Please help me in that. I will be happy to post and =
share the results
with anyone and if it is okay I will also post it on this=
 forum.

Here is the link to the survey. It should only take you 5 minutes.=


https://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=3Dzfbx0YhilnOVMwXpSjTWYw_3d_3d

Th=
anks in advance for any participation!
